question: In which year Board for Reconstruction of Public Sector Enterprises was constituted?
In which of the following countries maximum number of Branches of Indian Banks are located?
From the given options, bring out the one which is not a function / power of Reserve Bank of India:
option1: To assume the responsibility of meeting directly or indirectly all reasonable demands for accommodation
option2: To hold cash reserves of the commercial banks and make available financial accommodation to them
option3: To enjoy monopoly of the note issue
option4: To assume the responsibility of statistical analysis of data related to macro economy of India
answer: To assume the responsibility of statistical analysis of data related to macro economy of India

question: In which of the following countries  prevalent the Pay as you earn (PAYE) , a withholding tax system?
Which of the following imaginary circumstances, the Reserve bank of India will opt to sell Government securities in the open market?
option1: When the Foreign funds inflow is meek
option2: When there is enormous Foreign Funds Inflow in the Indian Economy
option3: When banks have low liquidity and need liquidity
option4: When Government of India asks the RBI to sell securities
answer: When there is enormous Foreign Funds Inflow in the Indian Economy

Which among the following is the correct character of the Foreign Exchange Markets?
option1: Foreign Exchange markets are localized markets
option2: Foreign Exchange markets operate within a country’s time zone
option3: Foreign Exchange markets are used only for trade related transactions
option4: Foreign Exchange markets are dynamic and round the clock markets
answer: Foreign Exchange markets are dynamic and round the clock markets
